---
title: Net Nanny
---
erDiagram
    INFO {
        string plugin_version
        string homebridge_api_version
        string homebridge_server_version
        string hap_library_version
        integer accessory_version
    }
    TARGETS {
        string id PK "Default 0"
        string name
        integet type "Default 0"
    }
    DATA {
        integer id PK "Default 0, AutoIncrement"
        integer latency_val "Default 0"
        integer jitter_val "Default 0"
        integer loss_val "Default 0"
        integer fault_code "Default 0"
    }
    HISTORY {
        integer id PK "Default 0, AutoIncrement"
        Date date "Default now"
        string target_id FK "Key to the target table entry"
        integer data_id FK "Key to the data table"       
    }
    HISTORY ||--|{ TARGETS : has
    HISTORY ||--|{ DATA : has
